r.s: Send notifications to Growl from PHP on MACOSX
r.d: Growl is a MACOSX application that listen to notifications sent by applications and displays them on the desktop using different display styles. Net_Growl offers the possibility to send notifications to Growl from your PHP application through network communication using UDP.
r.n:
Additions and changes: - unit tests may now be run on any computer
